content:
### Bug fixes


* [Function:](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.code/index.md) Fixed a bug leaving the code editor size unchanged after resizing the window.
* [Function Item:](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.code/index.md) Fixed a bug leaving the code editor size unchanged after resizing the window.
* [IF:](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.if.md) Removed the empty sections left after removing a condition.
* Item Lists: Fixed an erroneous placeholder text.
